scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of men, some kneeling and others standing, looking upwards with hands clasped in prayer or awe. They are gathered on a green, hilly landscape. In the upper part of the image, the feet and lower legs of a figure, presumably Christ, are seen ascending into a blue sky. In the background, a city with towers and spires is visible. The entire scene is framed by an arched border with decorative elements.
